subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|舁|同|t1=to raise|t2=together|ls=ic}} – to hold up together.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[rise]]; to [[get up]]
# to [[thrive]]; to [[prosper]]; to [[flourish]]
# [[prosperous]]; [[flourishing]]
# [[popular]]; [[fashionable]]
#* {{zh-x|呢{nei1}排{paai4} 擺酒 唔 興 食 魚翅。|These days, shark fin soup isn't popular in banquets.|C}}
# to [[start]]; to [[build]]; to [[establish]]
# to [[elect]]; to [[promote]]
# to [[succeed]]; to [[achieve]] [[success]]
# to [[send]]; to [[dispatch]]; to [[launch]]; to [[mount]]
# to [[collect]]; to [[recruit]]
# to [[do]]; to [[perform]]
# to [[advocate]]; to [[encourage]]
# to [[indulge]]; to [[spoil]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal|usually in the negative}} to [[allow]]; to [[permit]]
# [[maybe]]; [[perhaps]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[excitement]]; [[interest]]; [[mood]] in doing something
#: {{zh-x|高興|happy [lit. high mood]}}
# [[sensual]] [[desire]]; [[sexual]] desire; [[passion]]
# {{lb|zh|obsolete|or|Min}} to [[like]]; to be [[fond]] of; to [[love]]
# to [[liken]]; to [[analogise]]
# {{lb|zh|rhetoric}} [[metaphor]]
# {{lb|zh|poetry}} [[association]]; [[speak]]ing first of something else to [[lead]] up to the [[main]] [[theme]]
